Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his first adventure involving a suspicious sedan, a yacht, and a sunken Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Human Meteor
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic and the Human Meteor character on the cover page.

sub_scenes.title: From Taxi Ride to Transformation
sub_scenes.description: Duke's taxi service leads to an encounter with playboys and the emergence of a suspicious sedan, prompting Duke's transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicious Sedan and the Human Meteor's Emergence

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Hospital Clues
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the sedan occupants, leading to police involvement and a hospital visit where a new clue about a yacht is revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Yacht Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to stowaway on the yacht, and Toby attempts to execute this plan, leading to his discovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Pete's Yacht Duty and Suspicious Chart
Duke's Observation and Toby's Confirmed Action

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Rescue and Submarine Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor intervenes underwater to rescue Pete and discovers a sunken Japanese submarine, revealing a larger conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Rush and Pete's Rescue
Discovery of the Sunken Japanese Submarine
Inside the Submarine: Torpedo Loading Operation

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Conflict and Counter-Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor is ambushed underwater, escapes, and then retaliates against the submarine after being attacked from the surface.

narrative_arcs.title: Surface Attack and Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Ship's Reaction and Cabin Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The ship reacts to the torpedo attack, and Human Meteor investigates Peter's cabin, uncovering a depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Map Discovery in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: The mystery of the yacht and submarine is resolved, leading to Toby's rescue and the children's recovery in the hospital, ending with a hopeful outlook.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Drive Home and Future Growth
Bedtime and Anticipation of New Adventures

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline featuring the Liberty Lads in a confrontation with Nazis.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Liberty Lads storyline with a heated standoff against Nazis.

Major_Arcs.title: The Wallet Mystery and Boys in Danger
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Skip and Chuck, who find a wallet and become entangled in a dangerous situation involving gangsters and a carbon monoxide poisoning plot.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and the Wallet
sub_scenes.description: The boys witness an ambulance arrival and find a dropped wallet, initiating their involvement in a new mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person at the House

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: The boys attempt to return the wallet at a garage, leading to a suspicious encounter and a dangerous ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Garage to Return the Wallet

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: The boys are interrogated about the wallet, and a sinister plan for carbon monoxide poisoning is devised against them.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning and Suspicion about the Wallet
Wallet Examination and Discovery of Address

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Rescue at the Garage
sub_scenes.description: As the plan is about to be executed, Major Bronson betrays Horst and helps the boys escape, leading to a dramatic rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Seeking Marine Help
sub_scenes.description: The boys escape the garage and split up, seeking help and heading towards the waterfront and Marine Barracks.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Secret Office and Sabotage Plans
sub_scenes.description: Skip stumbles upon a secret office and discovers sabotage plans, leading to a confrontation with foreign agents.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Assault and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Marines are alerted, and a forceful entry at the barracks ensues, leading to a confrontation and rescue attempt.

sub_scenes.title: Marines Intervention and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive to rescue Major Bronson and the boys, leading to a fight against the Nazis and eventual victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Nazi Rats' Taunt and Marine Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces The Champ and Henry in South America, entangled in intrigue and battling Nazi agents while investigating a kidnapping.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Mission Brief
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and their mission against Nazi agents in South America.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission

sub_scenes.title: South American Town and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry arrive in a South American town and are immediately confronted and interrogated by local officers.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery in South American Town and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plot and Forced Ride
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's scheme is revealed, and the men are forcibly taken to Rosita's mother's house, setting up the rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Rosita's Mother's House

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Plan and Execution at El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Rosita's mother pleads for help and provides information, leading to a rescue plan involving infiltration and diversion at El Tigre's hideout.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Help and Intelligence from Rosita's Mother
Sneaking into El Tigre's Hideout and Planning a Diversion
Money Diversion and El Tigre's Distraction

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission Mobilization
sub_scenes.description: Misunderstandings are cleared, and news of Rosita's location mobilizes the rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Execution of Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: The rescue team aggressively pursues and infiltrates the enemy location to find Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution of Rosita's Rescue and Celebration
sub_scenes.description: The rescue mission culminates in a brawl and the arrival of government troops, leading to Rosita's successful rescue and a moment of gratitude.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, battling an international spy ring and facing native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Orders
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and a report to Captain Lawton about a grave matter.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Brawl with Devil Dog Dolan
Reporting a Grave Matter to Captain Lawton

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Leatherneck infiltrates the jungle and faces a hidden threat, leading to a native ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival, Jungle Infiltration, and Hidden Threat

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: A native man is captured and searched, leading to orders from a sinister interrogator and the torture of Devil Dog to obtain sub detector plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Capture and Initial Search of the Native Man
Preparation for Torture and Forced Compliance
Cooperation and Information Exchange with Foreign Agent

sub_scenes.title: Arson and Revenge
sub_scenes.description: Dolan confesses to arson, leading to chaos and the death of Sam, fueling Dolan's resolve for revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Sam's Sacrifice and Dolan's Vengeful Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Fight and Alliance with Natives
sub_scenes.description: Dolan engages in combat with natives, leading to the chief's defeat and a surprising alliance with the tribe.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain Grauer's Dilemma and Shore Leave Chaos
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Captain Grauer's dilemma regarding his captured son and the chaotic shore leave involving Dolan and other marines.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Capture of Son
sub_scenes.description: Captain Grauer faces a dilemma due to his captured son, Sam, and contemplates surrendering plans.

sub_scenes.title: Brawls and American Vigor
sub_scenes.description: Marines engage in fierce brawls, showcasing their aggressive fighting style.

sub_scenes.title: Shore Leave Reward and Service Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is rewarded with shore leave but then administers a bizarre form of discipline to another officer, highlighting service importance.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Reward and Service Spanking

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker's Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover a conspiracy involving racketeers and a sick child needing a blood transfusion.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins story and their background as crime fighters.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Initial Investigation of Murder
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are assigned to investigate the banker's murder, starting their inquiry at the newspaper office, police station, and hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly's Illness

sub_scenes.title: Blood Type and Conspiracy
sub_scenes.description: Investigation reveals Miss Reilly's rare blood type and connections to racketeer Farnacci, uncovering a potential conspiracy through a news broadcast.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Inform Elijah and Phone Call

sub_scenes.title: Search and Ambush at Mrs. Murphy's
sub_scenes.description: The Twins search for Tom Reilly, leading them to Mrs. Murphy and an ambush by gangsters.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and the Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Resolution in Irish Neighborhood
sub_scenes.description: The ambush leads to a car chase through an Irish neighborhood, culminating in the apprehension of the gangsters with community help.

narrative_arcs.title: Diane's Cab Chase and Irish Blockade
Irish Neighborhood Intervention and Police Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Hospital and Blood Transfusion for Reilly
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to the hospital where the injured are taken, and the urgent need for a blood transfusion for Tom Reilly becomes critical.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hospital and Anxious Wait
Urgent Need for Blood Transfusion and Initial Mismatch

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Community responds to the call for blood donors, leading to successful blood matching and transfusion for Tom Reilly and hopeful anticipation for his recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent Call and Community Response for Blood Donors

sub_scenes.title: Police Action and Celebration of Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Demand for justice leads to police action against Farnacci, and time skips to a celebration of Lassie's recovery, marking a happy resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Police Involvement
Police Raid and Confrontation at the Poolroom
